contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of August 2005, we QUASH the notice of appeal. Having retained jurisdiction of this matter pursuant to the Order at No. 18 WM 2005 granting permission to appeal an interlocutory order, we AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
Justice SAYLOR files a concurring statement in which Chief Justice CAPPY and Justice CASTILLE join.
